reviewText: Little Shea loves, loves, loves Word World.  So do I.  Very clever, violence and sadness free.  I even enjoy watching it with her because it is so clever.  The word barn is a barn and the word tub is a tub, etc.  She sing with the characters and repeats words with them.  Great aide for toddlers.
The Word World series is brilliant.  When one of  the dvd's at our home was damaged, my grandchildren asked me to please send them another one.  These are wonderful!
Just like the TV show, this World World DVD is high quality and just what my son wanted.  Thank you very much!
Great transaction.  Fast shipping.  Everything as promised.  My 4 year old daughter can't get enough of this movie and its helping her learn to read.

These DVD are wonderful. They keep children mesmerized and what a learing tool. I enjoy watching them too! It is so cute the way they teach children words. It's amazing all the new tech to teach our young ones words. ThanksWordWorld: Dancing Dog
My 2 year old grandson loves all the WordWorld shows...He walks in the house and says WordWorld.  I always had learning tapes and toys for my kids but these are the best!!!

This is wonderful for children.  It not only teaches them spelling but how to work with others.
Dr. Suess would be proud!
my 2 yr old loves Word World!! great videos.
Keeps kid's attention and helps them learn letters and spelling.  Nothing bad about that.
Word World videos are 'OUTSTANDING". Fun to learn.
I love the theme song for WordWorld, and the concept of the show is really fun. We were bummed when it went off of PBS Kids, but so happy to find it on Amazon.
see my other reviews on this series
Word World is art meets education plus fun. My son can't get enough on duck and dog. Will buy more.
